channel.title: High compression warez communities?
channel.description:
Does any one know any forums or sites which use high compression on their warez?
I know a while back they used to be very popular with slow internet as a few hundred mb could be compressed down to around 50mb etc.
More specifically im looking for games. As i have a fairly small download cap i would prefere to download compressed wares to save my quota for actual gaming.
for those who dont believe me about the compression i believe UHARC (or something like that) can compress very strongly and there is another one capable of compressing 1 gig into under 100mb.
The downside of this is it does take a long time to decompress but all i care about right now is being able to download them.
edit: one of the most common archivers i believe they use : http://kgbarchiver.net/
